00042 AssayType CalvinCHPHeaderAdapter::GetAssayType() const
00043 {
00044         AssayType result = FusionUnknown;
00045 
00046         std::string tmp = calvinChp->GetAssayType();
00047         if(tmp == CHP_EXPRESSION_ASSAY_TYPE)
00048         {
00049                 result = FusionExpression;
00050         }
00051         else if(tmp == CHP_GENOTYPING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00052         {
00053                 result = FusionGenotyping;
00054         }
00055         else if(tmp == CHP_RESEQUENCING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00056         {
00057                 result = FusionResequencing;
00058         }
00059         else if(tmp == CHP_UNIVERSAL_ASSAY_TYPE)
00060         {
00061                 result = FusionUniversal;
00062         }
00063         return result;
00064 }

00117 void CalvinCHPHeaderAdapter::GetAlgorithmParameters(FusionTagValuePairTypeList& values)

00133 FusionTagValuePairTypeList CalvinCHPHeaderAdapter::Convert(ParameterNameValueTypeVector& nvt)
00134 {
00135         FusionTagValuePairTypeList list;
00136         FusionTagValuePairType type;
00137         for(ParameterNameValueTypeVector::size_type i = 0; i < nvt.size(); ++i)
00138         {
00139                 type.Tag = nvt[i].GetName();
00140                 type.Value = nvt[i].ToString();
00141                 type.DetailedType() = nvt[i];
00142                 list.push_back(type);
00143         }
00144         return list;
00145 }

00149 {
00150         ParameterNameValueTypeVector nvt=calvinChp->GetChipSums();
00151         values = Convert(nvt);
00152 }

00207 void CalvinCHPHeaderAdapter::GetBackgroundZoneInfo(BackgroundZoneInfo& info)
00208 {
00209         int32_t count = calvinChp->GetBackgroundZoneCnt();
00210         info.number_zones = (int)count;
00211         info.smooth_factor = 0.0f;
00212         
00213         CHPBackgroundZoneVector zones;
00214         calvinChp->GetBackgroundZones(0,count,zones);
00215 
00216         CHPBackgroundZoneVector::iterator begin = zones.begin();
00217         CHPBackgroundZoneVector::iterator end = zones.end();
00218 
00219         // Get the smooth factor from the first zone.
00220         if (begin != end)
00221                 info.smooth_factor = begin->GetSmoothFactor();
00222 
00223         for(;begin != end; ++begin)
00224         {
00225                 BackgroundZoneType bzt;
00226                 bzt.background = begin->GetBackground();
00227                 bzt.centerx = begin->GetCenterX();
00228                 bzt.centery = begin->GetCenterY();
00229                 
00230                 info.zones.push_back(bzt);
00231         }
00232 }
00233 
00237 void CalvinCHPHeaderAdapter::GetBackgroundZones(BackgroundZoneTypeList& zones)
00238 {
00239         int32_t count = calvinChp->GetBackgroundZoneCnt();
00240 
00241         CHPBackgroundZoneVector vec;
00242         calvinChp->GetBackgroundZones(0,count,vec);
00243 
00244         CHPBackgroundZoneVectorIt begin = vec.begin(), end = vec.end();
00245         for(; begin != end; begin++)
00246         {
00247                 BackgroundZoneType type;
00248                 type.background = begin->GetBackground();
00249                 type.centerx = begin->GetCenterX();
00250                 type.centery = begin->GetCenterY();
00251                 zones.push_back(type);
00252         }
00253 }
00254 
00258 void CalvinCHPHeaderAdapter::GetBackgroundZone(BackgroundZoneType& type, int x, int y)
00259 {
00260                         CHPBackgroundZone zone;
00261                         calvinChp->GetBackgroundZone(x,zone);
00262                         type.background = zone.GetBackground();
00263                         type.centerx = zone.GetCenterX();
00264                         type.centery = zone.GetCenterY();
00265 }

00299 bool CalvinCHPDataAdapter::GetExpressionResults(int index, FusionExpressionProbeSetResults& result)
00300 {
00301         if(calvinChp.GetAssayType() == CHP_EXPRESSION_ASSAY_TYPE)
00302         {
00303                 CHPExpressionEntry entry;
00304 
00305                 // row is the same as index
00306                 calvinChp.GetEntry(index, entry);
00307                 result.SetDetectionPValue(entry.GetDetectionPValue());
00308 
00310                 result.SetSignal(entry.GetSignal());
00311 
00313                 result.SetNumPairs(entry.GetNumPairs());
00314 
00316                 result.SetNumUsedPairs(entry.GetNumPairsUsed());
00317 
00319                 result.SetDetection(entry.GetDetection());
00320 
00322                 result.SetHasCompResults(entry.GetHasComparisonData());
00323 
00325                 result.SetChangePValue(entry.GetChangePValue());
00326 
00328                 result.SetSignalLogRatio(entry.GetSigLogRatio());
00329 
00331                 result.SetSignalLogRatioLow(entry.GetSigLogRatioLo());
00332 
00334                 result.SetSignalLogRatioHigh(entry.GetSigLogRatioHi());
00335 
00337                 result.SetNumCommonPairs(entry.GetCommonPairs());
00338 
00340                 result.SetChange(entry.GetChange());
00341 
00342                 return true;
00343         }
00344         return false;
00345 }
00346 
00352 bool CalvinCHPDataAdapter::GetGenotypingResults(int index, FusionGenotypeProbeSetResults& result)
00353 {
00354         if(calvinChp.GetAssayType() == CHP_GENOTYPING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00355         {
00356                 CHPGenotypeEntry entry;
00357                 calvinChp.GetEntry(index, entry);
00358                 result.SetAlleleCall(entry.GetCall());
00359                 result.SetConfidence(entry.GetConfidence());
00360                 result.SetRAS1(entry.GetRAS1());
00361                 result.SetRAS2(entry.GetRAS2());
00362                 result.SetPValueAA(entry.GetAACall());
00363                 result.SetPValueAB(entry.GetABCall());
00364                 result.SetPValueBB(entry.GetBBCall());
00365                 result.SetPValueNoCall(entry.GetNoCall());
00366                 return true;
00367         }
00368         return false;
00369 }

00376 bool CalvinCHPDataAdapter::GetUniversalResults(int index, FusionUniversalProbeSetResults& result)
00377 {
00378         if(calvinChp.GetAssayType() == CHP_UNIVERSAL_ASSAY_TYPE)
00379         {
00380                 CHPUniversalEntry entry;
00381                 calvinChp.GetEntry(index, entry);
00382                 result.SetBackground(entry.GetBackground());
00383                 return true;
00384         }
00385         return false;
00386 }
00387 
00388 bool CalvinCHPDataAdapter::GetResequencingResults(FusionResequencingResults& results)
00389 {
00390         if(calvinChp.GetAssayType() == CHP_RESEQUENCING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00391         {
00392                 CHPReseqEntry entry;
00393                 int32_t sz = calvinChp.GetEntryCount();
00394                 results.ResizeCalledBases(sz);
00395                 results.ResizeScores(sz);
00396                 for(int i = 0; i < sz; i++)
00397                 {
00398                         calvinChp.GetEntry(i, entry);
00399                         results.SetCalledBase(i, entry.call);
00400                         results.SetScore(i, entry.score);
00401                 }
00402 
00403                 sz = calvinChp.GetForceCnt();
00404                 results.ResizeForceCalls(sz);
00405                 CHPReseqForceCall f;
00406                 for(int i = 0; i < sz; i++)
00407                 {
00408                         calvinChp.GetForceCall(i, f);
00409                         FusionForceCallType fusionType(f.position, f.call, f.reason);
00410                         results.SetForceCall(i, fusionType);
00411                 }
00412 
00413                 sz = calvinChp.GetOrigCnt();
00414                 results.ResizeOrigCalls(sz);
00415                 CHPReseqOrigCall b;
00416                 for(int i = 0; i < sz; i++)
00417                 {
00418                         calvinChp.GetOrigCall(i, b);
00419                         FusionBaseCallType fusionType(b.position, b.call);
00420                         results.SetOrigCall(i, fusionType);
00421                 }
00422                 return true;
00423         }
00424         return false;
00425 }

00427 // Functions to read file.
00428 bool CalvinCHPDataAdapter::Read()
00429 {
00430         CHPFileReader reader;
00431         try
00432         {
00433                 reader.Read(calvinChp);
00434         }
00435         catch(...)
00436         {
00437                 return false;
00438         }
00439         return true;
00440 }

00482 /*
00483  * Can this object read the file
00484  */
00485 bool CalvinCHPDataAdapter::CanReadFile()
00486 {
00487         CHPFileReader reader;
00488         try
00489         {
00490                 reader.Read(calvinChp);
00491         }
00492         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException&)
00493         {
00494                 return false;
00495         }
00496 
00497         return true;
00498 }

00517 /*
00518  * Get the probe set name
00519  */
00520 std::string CalvinCHPDataAdapter::GetProbeSetName(int index)
00521 {
00522     if (calvinChp.GetAssayType() == CHP_EXPRESSION_ASSAY_TYPE)
00523         {
00524             CHPExpressionEntry entry;
00525             calvinChp.GetEntry(index, entry);
00526         return entry.GetProbeSetName();
00527     }
00528     else if (calvinChp.GetAssayType() == CHP_GENOTYPING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00529     {
00530         CHPGenotypeEntry entry;
00531             calvinChp.GetEntry(index, entry);
00532         return entry.GetProbeSetName();
00533     }
00534     return "";
00535 }
